email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 20-25. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. The adjusted rate and demurrage terms are acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the shipment. Could you send over the charter party agreement for review? Also, please confirm the laytime start and end dates. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that we’re aligned. I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. The laytime will start on October 20 and end on October 25. Please let me know if you need any adjustments or have further questions. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the charter party agreement looks good. We’ll proceed with the terms as discussed. Please confirm once the agreement is signed on your end. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, the charter party agreement has been signed on our end. Everything is confirmed for the MV Ocean Star, with laytime October 20-25 and freight rate at $50.75 per metric ton. Let’s stay in touch as the laycan approaches. Best, Sarah
